CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1962 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1962 Code which were carried over into the 1986 Code, and which are in whole or in part a source from which provisions in this 2008 Code are derived. For the location of sections of the 1986 Code and of ordinances included herein, see the tables immediately following this table.
EXPAND
1962 Code

this Code
